downloadDescription: Instructions for creating your employee data file header row that you send on a regular cadence to Viva Glint to be used as filters in your survey feedback reporting
detailsSection: Instructions for creating your employee data file header row that you send on a regular cadence to Viva Glint to be used as filters in your survey feedback reporting
installInstructionSection:
Use each tab of this .xlsx document to ensure that your Employee Attribute File uses consistent headings and required formatting. Pay specific attention to dates and other numerical formatting.
  1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file, or find the file on your device and open it.
Additional resources: This template is referenced in Create your Employee Attribute Template in Viva Glint.
